info.title: Facebook Graph (Achievement Type) API
info.description: API for managing Facebook Achievement Types

get.summary: A games achievement type created by a Facebook App
get.description: A games achievement type created by a Facebook App

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The app that created the achievement.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Context of the achievement for the associated app

parameters.name: created_time
parameters.description: Time when the achievement was created

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: An object containing the points this achievement is worth.

parameters.name: is_scraped
parameters.description: Whether the URL containing the achievement metadata has been scraped by Facebook servers.

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: Time when the achievement was last updated

get.summary: A games achievement type created by a Facebook App
get.description: A games achievement type created by a Facebook App
